New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest goal in German international history
Wirtz's goal was only the second-fastest goal ever scored in international football
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opener in the seventh second
Kai Havertz added to the lead in the second period
Pre-Game Insights: Toni Kroos registered assists upon returning to international football
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wirtz's effort is the fastest goal in German international history
Christoph Baumgartner's goal in six seconds was the fastest in international football history
Others: Julian Nagelsmann's side will try and hold on to their first-half lead and clinch the tie against the 2018 world champions
